title: The area of the D P Road/Reserved land/Amenity area has been ascertained on the basis of Joint Measurement Survey with SLR/C
clause_text: The area of the D P Road/Reserved land/Amenity area has been ascertained on the basis of Joint Measurement Survey with SLR/C.S. Office under M.R. Plan No. dated ............................ with communication No. dated
